text: @PaulaReidCBS @CDCgov @FaceTheNation 42 countries have tested MORE of their citizens for Covid-19 per capita than USA. Many of them way more. Why does USA still lag so far behind in testing? Lack of testing contributed to terrible results in the USA to date and will keep USA from reopening without carnage. 42!

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Face the Nation
entity.description: "Face the Nation," which is one of the longest-running news programs on the air, offers insight and analysis on the top issues of the day. Moderator Margaret Brennan welcomes politicians, government leaders and international newsmakers to a roundtable discussion of current events with CBS News correspondents.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
